author: tucu
msg: MAPREDUCE-1744. DistributedCache creates its own FileSytem instance when adding a file/archive to the path. (Dick King via tucu)

author: stsp
msg: table does not record locally unversioned parents, but parents that are
locally added or copied, and therefore (probably) do not yet exist in the
repository. As written, the comment was misleading because it was talking
about "unversioned parents", which sound like locally unversioned nodes.

author: yonik
msg: don't create separate tlog to recover from, use one from old log list, seek to end when opening existing file so we can append correctly

author: pamarcelot
msg: Added a new configuration element to specify the state of the 'Open Configuration' action.
